revised_title: Dredged Corals from Deep Waters: A Preliminary Report
tldr: This article presents a preliminary report on the true corals collected by H.M.S. 'Challenger' during deep-sea dredging between 1870 and 1875. The author discusses the challenges of identifying and categorizing the corals, as well as the differences in coral specimens obtained from various depths and locations. The findings contribute to the understanding of deep-sea coral species and their distribution.
